name: Ancient Alphabet Dictionary
pages:
Hello colleague, since you are about to explore a structure older than the others, I thought I could help you read the inscriptions you'll find there.

ᔑ = A
ʖ = B
ᓵ = C
↸ = D

ᒷ = E
⎓ = F
⊣ = G
⍑ = H
╎ = I
⋮ = J
ꖌ = K
ꖎ = L
ᒲ = M
リ = N
𝙹 = O
!¡ = P
ᑑ = Q

To practice, try translating this:
⊣ꖎ╎ ⚍𝙹ᒲ╎リ╎ ⍊ᒷ∷↸╎ ᓵ╎ ⊣⚍ᔑ∷↸ᔑリ𝙹
